pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the 'DeepL' Translation API // A wrapper for the 'DeepL' API, a web service for translating texts between different languages. Access to the official API (see https://www.deepl.com/translator) is subject to a monthly fee. No authentication key is required for the undocumented DeepL JSON-RPC API. The package provides functions for both types of API calls.
